document_data.name: Jhant Daxer
document_data.mainbody: '''Jhant Daxer''' was a tavern owner who inhabited the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He had fox-like features and a ruthless demeanor.
document_data.Activities: Jhant assumed ownership of the popular tavern and festhall called [[the Gentle Mermaid]] in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] when the previous owner died. Before that he was a momeylender and caravan owner in [[Baldur's Gate]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Jhant was actually a front for [[Xanathar (original)|Xanathar]]. He smuggled, kidnapped, and performed all manner of illicit activities for the [[beholder]], causing him to rarely be seen at the Gentle Mermaid.
